commands.title: Force enable ngComponents utility on this workspace

ngComponents.componentGlobs.description: glob string used to search for files with components

ngComponents.controllerGlobs.description: glob string used to search for files with controllers

ngComponents.htmlGlobs.description: glob string used to search for HTML files for references of the components

ngComponents.routeGlobs.description: glob string used to search for angular-ui-router files for references of the components

ngComponents.goToDefinition.description: Specify which parts of the component should the Go To Definition action show

ngComponents.controller.publicMembersOnl.description: Set to false to show all members in auto complete

ngComponents.controller.excludedMembers.description: Regular expression which can exclude additional members (defaults to exclude Angular lifecycle hooks)

ngComponents.logging.verbose.description: Set to true to enable verbose logging in developers console

ngComponents.logging.redirectToFile.description: Set path to which you want to redirect logging to

ngComponents.forceEnable.description: Use this setting to force enable the extension if AngularJS was not detected automatically

ngComponents.angularRoot.description: Custom Angular root folder relative to workspace root (defaults to workspace root)

ngComponents.memberDiagnostics.enabled.description: Enables validation of all components' HTML templates in regards to fields that are used there (experimental)

ngComponents.memberDiagnostics.html.chec.description: When disabled use of component's binding in the template when it's not defined in the controller will issue a warning
When disabled use of component's controller member in the template will issue a warning
